patthana23.44:1.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasavitakkasavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho savitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.44:2.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naavitakkavicāramattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho avitakkavicāramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.44:3.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naavitakkaavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho avitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
